q1.question: Sɛ wɔwo obi Fiada a ɛyɛ dabɔne a, wɔbefrɛ no sɛn?

q5.question: Nnoɔma a wɔde ma abarimaa a waduru ne mpanin mfeɛ so no, ɛdeɛn na ɛsɛ sɛ ɔde yɛ?

q6.question: Sɛ Akanfoɔ ka sɛ, abaayewa bi kɔ afikyire a, na ɛkyerɛ sɛn?
possibleAnswers: A. Ɔne ne fiefoɔ anya akasakasa.
B. Wakɔtena ne fie no akyi.
C. Watu afiri ne fie a ɔte mu.

possibleAnswers: B. ɛde mmusuo bɛba no so

q10.question: Amanneɛ bɛn na wɔyɛ de gya owufoɔ kwan korakora wɔ Akanman mu?

q11.question: Akanman mu no, adɛn nti na obi rewu a, wɔgu n'anom nsuo? Wɔgye di sɛ ...
possibleAnswers: B. ɔrekɔforɔ bepɔ enti ɔbia nsuo
D. ne ho nsuo nyinaa asa.

q12.question: Kukuo a okunafoɔ bɔ no kurotia no kyerɛ sɛn?
possibleAnswers: B. Ɔne ne kunu adi nte emu.
D. Ne bo afu ne kunu nɔ.

q15.question: Sɛ ɔbaa ware a, ne kunu nuabarima mma yɛ ne deɛn?

q16.question: Sɛ awofoɔ bi brɛ ansa na wɔawo abɔfra a, wɔtaa frɛ no sɛn?

q17.question: Sɛ abɔfra bi de Asaaseasa a, na aseɛ ne sɛn?
possibleAnswers: C. Ɔrennya baabi nteni wɔ wiase.

q18.question: Sɛ ɔbaa bi wo ntaa na sɛ ɛyɛ ɔbaa ne ɔbarima a, yɛfrɛ wɔn sɛn?

q21.question: Sɛ wɔyi ɔhene foforɔ a, ɛdeɛn na ɔyɛ kyerɛ ne manfoɔ?

q22.question: Amanneɛ bɛn na wɔyɛ de kyerɛ sɛ wɔatu ɔhene bi adeɛ so?
possibleAnswers: D. Yɛworɔ ne nan mu mpaboa.

q23.question: Mpanimfoɔ a ɔhene ne wɔn bu man no, wɔfrɛ wɔn sɛn?

q24.question: Akanfoɔ mu no, wɔdi asɛm wie a, sika a wɔde ma wɔn a wɔdi asɛm no, wɔfrɛ no sɛn?

q25.question: Sɛ Akanfoɔ retu agyina wɔ asɛnnie mu a, ɛkyerɛ sɛn?
possibleAnswers: D. Wɔatu asɛm no ahyɛ da.

q26.question: Deɛ ɛdidi soɔ yi mu baako nka deɛ Akanfoɔ yɛ no wɔ asɛnnie mu no ho.
possibleAnswers: A. Wɔde deɛ ɔdi fɔ no to afiase.
D. Wɔtu wɔn nan si asɛm no so.

q28.question: Mpanimfoɔ se; ɔpanin dware wie a, na ...

q29.question: Dwuma bɛn na mmɛ tumi di wɔ ɔkasa mu?
